column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Accessibility to the public overall I rate as "mixed"
column2: but it is very good with a few exceptions. I
column3: like many of the museum's visitors
column4: enjoy fine art pieces on a casual basis. The museum has its gallery walks and express talks
column5: which are free group walks to view a specific piece or pieces
column6: led by a volunteer docent or frequently
column7: even by a staff museum educator. Thirty years of occasional lunch hours on these walks has
column9: greatly increased my enjoyment of the museum experience.
